resource.chars: This is a collection of seven illustrations on one page - six are of the Cicada and one is unrecognisable, but has the legend "I. Mynda deli" (Text?)  the Cicada is illustrated from above and below, with its wings open and closed.  It is clearly an attempt to give an accurate representation of the insect.  It is not possible to determine the medium (ink? pencil?) but it appears to be on aged paper.  it bears the designation 79B in the topright corner.
